attributes.action: gurantee all 100% of all savers funds in UK registered banks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following moves by Greece, Germany and other countries to gurantee 100% of savers funds the fact that this Government has failed to do so serves only increase the concern of those who have worked hard to save. 
This petition seeks to show the government that it has a moral duty to its citizens to follow the example set by other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
